Package com.circulus.database

Class DatabaseHelper

java.lang.Object
android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
com.circulus.database.DatabaseHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class DatabaseHelper extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
The class that defines an object used for saving game info into an SQLite database.

    • addOne

      public boolean addOne(GameModel gameModel)
      Adds a game to the game info database.

      Parameters:
      gameModel - The object that contains game info.
      Returns:
      True if the game info has been successfully added to the database, otherwise false.

    • getGames

      public List<GameModel> getGames(int mode)
      Get a list of games from the database

      Parameters:
      mode - What games to retrieve: 1 - favorites; otherwise - all.
      Returns:
      A list of games retrieved according to the given value.

    • deleteOne

      public boolean deleteOne(GameModel gameModel)
      Delete a game with the id of a given game from the database.

      Parameters:
      gameModel - The game to remove.
      Returns:
      True if the game was removed from the database, otherwise false.

    • toggleFavorite

      public boolean toggleFavorite(GameModel gameModel)
      Toggles the favorite value of a given game.

      Parameters:
      gameModel - The game to toggle favorite for.
      Returns:
      True if successful, otherwise false.
